nodes.bodyText: I could use some help to understand what is going on here: Is this necessary because RSA_4096_updated is used in other tests as a signing key, e.g. in testSigningKeyIsReloadedForEachRequest? Since the all tests run in the same JVM, once this key is added as a signing key, it can no longer be used as a encryption key here and vice versa (depends on which test runs first)?

Correct!

which meant that a single key would be
used both for signing and encryption in the same run
